title: Ancient Egypt: Civilization Along the Nile

vocab.definition: An advanced culture with cities, government, art, religion, and writing systems
The king of ancient Egypt, considered a god by the people
The writing system of ancient Egypt using pictures and symbols
A large stone tomb built for Egyptian pharaohs
The river that provided water and fertile soil for ancient Egyptian civilization

teachingNotes: Use maps to show the Nile River's importance. Discuss how geography influenced Egyptian culture. Compare Egyptian achievements to other ancient civilizations.
